name: WW Hurd
text: This place does it right; excellent work for reasonable prices.  This is certainly one of the best repair and service shops I have ever worked with.  Joe and all the staff were a pleasure to work with.  Quality people.  Top notch all the way.

name: Pang Heu
text: This is the best place ever. I knew nothing about golf cars and they are highly knowledgeable and honest. Friendly but not cheesy. High integrity. They will only sale you what you want. No sales gimmicks. Love them I would not go anywhere else and recommend this place to everyone. Family and locally owned. They also deliver and customize. Excellent service and business.

name: Jan Sizemore
text: We have been dealing with Smitty's Golf carts for over 20 years. I can honestly say that they are honest, stand behind what they sell, service and sales is friendly and honest . I cannot think of one negative thing to say after all these years. It's a great family owned business. Before buying anywhere else, give them a chance. Quality work. We are extremely happy.

text: WOW!!!! We are so happy with our resent new relationship with Smitty's Golf Cars.  We had no problems during the entire process, right down to the delivery and walk through.  Each person we came in contact with  was professional and respectful of our needs.  I can't say enough good things about our experience with Smitty's Golf Cars, just ask for Joe and the process will be smooth.

Mr. Gaines,
At Smitty’s, we have always taken pride in our customer service and competitive pricing on golf cars, accessories, parts, and service. Please call and ask for Joe at (205) 592-2888 so we can address your concerns and help you out with your golf car needs.

name: Natalie Hasley
text: Had a wonderful experience with Decatur Golf Carts!  They were incredibly helpful in answering all of my questions.  Zach was so awesome to work with and we appreciated his hard work to get our golf cart to us in the quick turn around time we requested.  Highly recommend!

text: It was ☆☆ to ☆☆☆☆☆ because I'd finally got some assistance from the guy there about my golf cart and his instructions were very easy to follow about my concern. Now I know who to call when I'm in need about my cart. Many thanks!

text: I went into randomly inquire about some rims and tires. I was going to spend alot of money but they inturn gave me options that saved me money. Great group of employees that look out for your best interest. Ill be back.

Love my golf cart!!! Dale does not take advantage of you!!! Great dealing with him...... Have sent friends to him, Good people

Sam

name: Jimmy Ray Smith
text: Dale can make you and your golf cart run great!

name: Gary Standridge
text: In my opinion Infinity golf carts is without a doubt! The best golf cart places out of the ones I've already been to. Their staff is amazingly friendly! The prices on their carts I really great even their used ones! Their staff is amazingly friendly. They're cart repair is done fast and efficiently. So if you're looking for a golf cart gas or electric. I ordered you to go by Infinity golf carts and just look around! I think you will be very happy you did.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!  We loved taking care of you!

name: JD Mobile Karaoke
text: As a business owner, I look for integrity and honesty to earn my trust to do business with others. I bought a used cart "as is" and when I got it to my property, it had a small issue with it. I called Blake the same day and he went above and beyond what I expected. He sent one of his mechanics the next day--45 minutes from his business--and took care of the issue and now it runs like a champ! Blake has earned my trust and I will definitely be using this business again.

resp.text: Thank you for your confidence and business!  We look forward to taking care of you in the future!

name: Myfirstcar66
text: They're just getting started- older building but they're making improvements and the owner was VERY helpful with my needs when I was just passing through town.

resp.text:
Thank you sir,
We will be here whenever you need us!

name: Nichole Bentley
text: Great company with very reasonable prices. Blake is super helpful and very quick to pick up if you're having any golf cart issues. I've had him repair my cart and we bought a second cart from him. Definitely the best place in town if you're in need of a golf cart or golf cart repair!

name: Louann Ciesinski
text:
The customer service is great and the staff is very knowledgeable about their golf carts. What we liked was that they have used and new golf carts. I will recommend this dealer and Blake to all of our friends and family.

L. Ciesinski

name: Beau Murphey
text:
I bought a golf cart from Infinity about a month ago. My goal was to take it to Florida and have it street legal. Although I knew I should buy from another dealer and probably in a Florida, the owner, Blake, assured me that he would make it legal and promised on at least 3 occasions that if it didn’t pass inspection that he would take the cart back and refund all of my money. I knew I should have gone with my gut, but instead I tried to help the little guy out and go with the small business owner.

I rented a trailer and drove two hours from Atlanta to pick up the cart. Although we had agreed Exactly what would be put on the cart, when I showed up only about half of the items were on the cart. I should have left then, but I had already put down a $1000 deposit for the work. An argument ensued with Blake and when he got there his workers started to put items on the golf cart. However, even though he told me he had them, all of the necessary items were not even in his possession. Many of the nuts and bolts had rust on them. It’s obvious that he just piece meals things together. If you are spending $50 it’s one thing, but when you are spending $5000 things should be right.  However , because I drove all that way  I elected to take the cart anyway and purchase the necessary missing items.

When the final purchase was made, Blake also guranteed the golf cart would run for one year. Well, two weeks after purchasing the cart it started to have trouble. After not passing inspection in Florida, I called Blake and he somehow claimed amnesia about offfering to take the golf cart back- just as I had predicted. So, now I have a golf cart that doesn’t run and I have to take to a reputable dealer to have it repaired.

So, if you are consider purchasing a cart from Infinity Golf Carts, go over every inch of the cart before you accept and pay for it. Blale is Not a man of his word, so make sure that Everything is in writing. Even then, if you have a problem do not expect him to be a man of his word.

name: Louis Hernandez
text: Great owners, prices, and service.I have dealt with Mr Pritchard for years now, always been fair and honest. Great to know somebody that can make things happen, without excuses!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Hernandez, we really appreciate your business.

name: Michael Smodilla
text: Stopped by and there is nothing but junk carts and the guy didn't know what he was talking about. Total waste of time. Buyers beware.

name: Chris Copeland
text: It's pretty good. My sister has used them for years and she loves them.

resp.text: Hey Chris! We appreciate the review, but, are puzzled about the 3 stars. What have we sold you, or, how have we done business with you?

name: Richard thomas
text: Great folks to deal with , honest , down to earth. Good carts and prices! Regards: Richard “ SemperFi “ 🇺🇸

resp.text: Thank you so much Richard! It was a pleasure to meet you and your beautiful wife!! Customers like y'all make our job so easy!!

name: Jonathan Peters
text: Fantastic selection and the staff is top knotch

name: Josh Pope
text: Excellent selection and service! They treated us like family and made sure we were satisfied with our purchase.

resp.text: Josh, we appreciate your business, and, that you trusted us to get you in the cart that suited your family! We hope you all enjoy your beautiful ride!!

name: Johnny McKenney
text:
Was really a nice place of business,
They were closed for holiday weekend,
We will go back when they are open

resp.text:
Thank you Johnny! We're sorry we missed you. All of us have been working very long, hard hours through this Covid 10 madness, and, needed to take a break for some rest and to get de-stressed.
We hope you can make it back to see us soon, and, that we will have a good inventory built back when you do, so we can get you fixed right up!!

name: Christopher Dobbins
text: Very nice and courteous...ill recommend this place...

resp.text: Thanks Christopher! Customers like you make our job enjoyable!!

name: Larry M Chancy

name: Mark Drake
text: Great business. I take my golf cart there for any repairs they are always reasonably priced with quick turn around time on the repairs. We'll run business. Highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thanks Mark! We appreciate your business, and look forward to many years of continued service!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kathy! We hope your family enjoys your beautiful golf cart!

name: Edward Nalls
text: Very friendly people!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Edward! It was a pleasure to meet you, and we certainly appreciate your business! We look forward to serving you again!

name: Jeff Hawkins
text: I just purchased a new 2021 Club Car Lifted Onward Lithium. What an awesome performer!!! Bill and his staff are very professional and caring. I added several options to the cart, including the Club Car Bluetooth sound system, which we love! They even had my new cart delivered to my home in Oxford, MS. I couldn't be more pleased!

resp.text: Thanks for your business and your 5 star review, Jeff! We're glad you enjoy this car. Please let us know if we can do anything else for you!

name: Ryan Parker
text: These guys are incredible! I am located in Ohio and have been trying to get my hands on a Cub Car lithium for several weeks without any luck... I searched all the dealers in my market as well as the surrounding states and everyone was on back-order which would have put me at mid-summer before I received my cart. I found these guys on the internet and couldn't be happier with their service and follow through. I needed a custom built car and needed it delivered to Ohio within a week... most dealers probably would have laughed at me but these guys rolled up their sleeves and made it happen! Drue, the sales manager was the man - took my calls at all times keeping me in the loop and accommodated all my upgrade request (even with the tight time frame!).. I would recommend these guys to anyone - whether you're in Alabama or anyplace else in the US - these guys are top notch and will do a fantastic job of taking care of you!

resp.text:
Hi Ryan! Thank you for choosing to do business with us.

We always do our best to meet our customers needs if at all possible and that includes requests like yours. We take all requests seriously because we want to ensure that everyone can share the same enjoyment we have when it comes to working with custom golf cars. Stay in touch!

name: Patrick Galloway
text: Great people, been doing business with them for years now!  Always have been able to solve any problem I've had quickly and charge fair prices.  New location is GREAT! Tons of inventory and even more space to work on vehicles!  Bill and his team do a great job!

text: Great experience purchasing a cart with Jay. We got the cart we wanted and the process was very easy. I highly recommend checking with Diamond Golf Cars if you are considering buying a golf cart.

text: Super easy to do business with.  Held a cart for me while I was getting company check delivered.  Golf Cart was used with new batteries.  Looked and drove amazingly.  Will purchase more for our apartment communities.

text: Very helpful. Answered all our questions. No pressure.

name: Mark & Tiffany Wilson
text: Do your homework and know what to look for unlike me. John sold me a cart with 4 year old batteries in it. Lasted less than a year. I would think when you tell someone it’s your first cart they would be honest with you. Guess not. When you call and ask questions John is rude and short with you. I’m actually surprised he’s still in business. Go elsewhere for your golf cart needs!!

One time I couldn't get my gas cart to start and I took it up there to him. We didn't even take it off the trailer and he lifted the seat and did some stuff and got it running. Tried to pay him and he said "no charge!"

Amazing service and great people!

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: The worst customer service ever. Called to set up service work, lady bit my head off as soon as I started talking. Then she told me to call back at 5:30 ..... They close at 5. So clearly they are doing well enough to loose my companies fleet service work.

text: Super nice guy!! Answers all your questions honestly and will get you in the cart you want and can afford!

name: Richard Voyles
text: Really great dealing with these folks. Prices are good and they will do whatever it takes to do a good deal. I wanted some upgrades to the cart I bought and the turn-around was 2 days. John also delivered it for free from Robertdale to just about the end of the Ft. Morgan Peninsula for me and spent another hour familiarizing us with the new purchase. These are stand up people to do business with. Highly recommend!

name: Hal Beckham
text: Great place to do business with. We have a 2017 Ezgo gas powered golf cart, someone decided they would steal the reverse/forward leaver. I stopped by Taylor's to purchase a replacement, none in stock, if ordered it would take a couple weeks for them to receive. They were gracious enough to take one off a brand new cart in their inventory to get me back in operation and on my way. Great coustomer service in my book.

resp.text: Thank you for you business!

name: Karen Etheredge
text: Picked up our golf cart on Friday And things were like the lights were disconnected n not reconnect back! Grew up with the previous owner and got wonderful service but can’t say that about these owners!

resp.text: I'm sorry that there was an issue. This was not brought to my attention but I will make sure that it is addressed.

name: Shawn Peterman
text: Great folks to deal with. Count on them going the extra mile to earn your business.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kristy Hinton
text: Took my cart to these guys they told me that my batteries were bad and my charger was dead! They recommend new batteries and a new charger. I bought a what I thought was a NEW charger from these guys little small compact charger and it couldn't have put a charge on the batteries for anything! So I return the charger the next day and I'm informed that is a refurbished charger! Really? There are no signs in the store that says that they only sale refurbished chargers anywhere and it was not specified refurbished on the receipt I got either! Needles to say i ordered the charger that goes with my Yamaha golf cart elsewhere! Keep in mind my batteries are bad..... I got a new charger and my problems were solved. I ride my golf cart every night for at least a couple of hours running the LED lights and sometimes a fan! These batteries are still running! But they are BAD According to the Cart Guys!!!!! Just saying be careful don't believe everything that they tell you. They really STRETCH the truth to make money because their friendliness and their personalities aren't making them money! It's telling you that you need more than you really need that's keeping them in business!

name: Teresa Hallford
text: Helpful staff, will help you find the right cart.

resp.text: Thank you for your business :)

Went by during posted hours and gate was lock.  Don’t know if they’re still in business but if they are they need to start being a little reponsive.

name: Crystal Chadwick

name: Luke LaValle
text:
Edit: I'm glad you don't feel it's warranted.. someone in my party accidentally mentioned AAA (who I do not use), and you shut us down. No one you recommended was able to tow either. I'm also not the only 1 star review, but I'm sure none of those are warranted either...

Outright refused to tow my car...
(Response) Yes I am sure, the car was in Leeds, AL. Owner refused towing services when we called. This was from the week of the 7th. It was broken into several days later on the highway. Your service was much appreciated

resp.text: Sir, If your tow was turned down it was due to us being behind and unable to reach you in a timely manner. When this happens we always recommend customers to the closest towing services that can assist you quicker. I understand your frustration but we cannot put you ahead of other customers. I don't feel that this negative review is warranted. ***We do not tow for motor clubs. Also, The fact that your car was broken into days later has nothing to do with us so why even include that? Seems like you are singling out this business since you didn't bother leaving feedback to other businesses you reached out to. ** Clearly this conversation isn't going anywhere. I consider it over.

name: Joanne Bonacci
text: Recently purchased a Mudhead GoKart and have been Extremely proud of the high Quality. 👏 This has turned out to be my nephew's most prized possession. The service was so great and all my technical questions were always answered quickly.
